definition: A polite expression used to acknowledge and apologize for a mistake, offense, or wrongdoing, typically used in interpersonal interactions. It is commonly employed to seek forgiveness or to show remorse in situations where one's actions or words have caused harm or inconvenience to others.

examples.german: Verzeihung, ich habe Ihren Namen vergessen.
examples.english: Excuse me, I forgot your name.

examples.german: Verzeihung, ich habe einen Fehler gemacht.
examples.english: Forgive me, I made a mistake.

examples.german: Verzeihung, ich habe Sie nicht gesehen.
examples.english: Excuse me, I didn't see you.
